prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---

Springfield is the sixth most populous city in Illinois, with a population of 10,566 as of 2019. It serves as the county seat of Sangamon County.

---

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Springfield, Illinois, populous city, population, county seat, Sangamon County
